Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two figures that might be interpreted as people (basic human figure with circles or lines).
Attempt to draw a line that could represent a string between the figures (basic attempt with no clear understanding of function).
CANNOT: Accurately depict how the string connects to the cups or the people (student may not draw cups at all or connect the string to them).
Show how sound travels through the string (no arrows or symbols to indicate sound movement).
Explain or depict that the device uses sound to send and receive information (no labels or incorrect labels used).
Show only the materials provided, like cups and string, used in the string telephone (student might include unrelated items like cans or boxes).
Include any details that demonstrate how this device helps people communicate over long distances (no thorough understanding or depiction).
